document_data.name: Xantharl's Keep
document_data.mainbody: '''Xantharl's Keep''' was a fortified village south of [[Mirabar]]. As of [[1370 DR]], it was home to a population of 475. It was known for its tall stone houses with steep roofs.
document_data.Structure: As its name suggested, Xantharl's Keep featured a central keep, its surrounding village and a fortified wall.
document_data.Government: During the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the keep's lordship was served [[Narbeck Horn]], who  in turn reported to the [[marchion]] of [[Mirabar]], by means of a ''[[sending stone]]''.
document_data.Defenses:
The keep was protected by 150 defenders, over twice the population of the accompanying village.

A number of [[crossbow|heavy crossbow]]s were mounted upon its outer wall.
document_data.History: Some time after the [[War of the Silver Marches]], the [[Frost giant]] [[Kaltivar]] laid siege to the keep with a small army of [[goblin]]s, [[hobgoblin]]s, and [[ogre]]s equipped with goblin-huckers. The giant used the siege as a ruse while he sent a gang of [[Bugbear]]s to find and capture the wanted [[shield dwarf]] criminal [[Worvil Forkbeard]], who was hiding within the [[Falling Orc inn]].
document_data.Notable locations:
* [[Bear and Black Buckler|The Bear and Black Buckler]]: An inn with beds warmed by [[bear]]-pelt covers.
* [[Falling Orc Inn|The Falling Orc]]: A smoky tavern run by the [[half-ogre]] [[Arzastra]].
